text: Omkaram is a 1997 Telugu action film directed by Upendra making his directorial debut in Telugu. The film stars Dr. Rajasekhar, Prema and Bhagyashree Patwardhan in lead roles.http://www.filmibeat.com/telugu/movies/omkara/cast-crew.html The film was a remake of director's own 1995 Kannada film Om with Prema reprising her role in the remake. The Telugu version was an average success in comparison to the original Kannada version.http://www.filmibeat.com/kannada/news/2013/kannada-movies-remade-in- other-languages-122546.html#slide27043 ==Cast== *Dr. Rajasekhar as Satya *Prema as Madhu *Bhagyashree as Shashi *J. V. Somayajulu as Satya's father *Upendra as the narrator of the first scene ==Soundtrack== The soundtrack was composed by Hamsalekha who also composed the songs for the original Kannada version . He retained three songs from the original while the fourth one was from one of his earlier Kannada movie. The retained songs from the original movie were: College Kurrodu https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_Ub993obZb0 was the retained version of College Kumar.https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SVJ25KPoHCk O Gulabi https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GJLBG8cn4L4 was the retained version of O Gulaabiye.https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=eLvUvuLr-fI Bullemma https://wynk.in/music/album/omkaram/hu_398538 was the retained version of Mehabooba.https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PqJs5zBK_FI While the other song Om Brahmanda https://wynk.in/music/album/omkaram/hu_398538 which comes in the place of Hey Dinakara retained only the opening Sanskrit verse from the original version https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8qRw44QqYSs and was followed by the tune of another Kannada song by Hamsalekha - Eke Heegaytho https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=D8EjqsFO6Tc from the 1988 Kannada movie Anjada Gandu. ;Telugu version http://telugusongs.allindiansite.com/omkaram.html *"College Kurrodu" - Mano *"O Gulabi" - S. P. Balasubrahmanyam *"Bullemma" - Mano *"Dilruba" - S. P. Balasubrahmanyam *"Om Brahmanda" - S. P. Balasubrahmanyam ;Tamil version https://itunes.apple.com/in/album/omkaaram- original-motion-picture/id982121750 *"College Student" - Mano *"O Rojave" - S. P. Balasubrahmanyam *"Kanne Vaa" - Devi *"Om Brahmananda" - S. P. Balasubrahmanyam *"I Love You" - S. P. Balasubrahmanyam ==References== ==External links== Category:1997 films Category:1990s Telugu-language films Category:Telugu remakes of Kannada films Category:Films scored by Hamsalekha Category:Films about organised crime in India Category:1990s crime action films Category:Indian crime action films Category:Indian films Category:Films directed by Upendra
title: Omkaram
